title: Hand Sanitizer Gel (16oz) Case
cartdesc: TruSafe is a topical antiseptic that kills 99.9% of the most common illness-causing germs.
shortdescription:
• Size UOM: 16oz with lotion pump
  • Case PK: 24 units
  • Case DIM: 8.875 in x 23.25 in x 7.125 in
  • Ships From: Bartlesville, OK | Oak Forest, IL
  • MOQ: 1 Case
  • Case wgt (LBS): 30 lbs
  • Pallet TI x HI: 8 x 5
  • Recommended MSRP: $4.49
  • RFQ: 1 Case
productdescription:
Designed by a former food and beverage executive to provide a clean fragrance free solution when soap and water is not available. Pharmaceutical grade alcohol made from Midwest Corn. Each batch tested to ensure potency and safety. But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure praising pain was born and I will give you complete account of the system expound.

TruSafe line of hand sanitizers is the perfect solution to help you get germs when soap and water are not readily available. TruSafe is a topical antiseptic that kills 99.9% of the most common illness-causing germs.
